name: Raiders' Unbreakable Mind
text:
(This card is always treated as a "The Phantom Knights" and "Raidraptor" card.)
If you Xyz Summon using a DARK Xyz Monster(s) as material: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If this face-up card in the Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed by card effect: You can Set 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell directly from your Deck or GY to your field. You can only use each effect of "Raiders' Unbreakable Mind" once per turn.
